Translations.Text: They juravit DEUS vos please vos when DEUS His messenger est dignus de pleasing they est really believers
they non know ut anyone opposes DEUS His messenger incurred fire Hell forever Hoc est malus humiliation
hypocrites injuria sura revealed exposing quod est their hearts dictus Iit ahead mock DEUS testimentum expose exactly QUOD VOS est afraid DE
Vos ask them they dictus Nos would est unus mocking kidding. Dictus vos realize vos est Perfecit mocking DEUS His revelations His messenger
Non apologize! Vos disbelieved post believed Nos pardon some de vos nos punish others vos consequence their wickedness
hypocrite vir hypocrite femina belong cum each alius - they advocate malus prohibit righteousness they est stingy They forgot DEUS He forgot them. hypocrites est enim wicked
DEUS promises hypocrite VIR hypocrite FEMINA ALIAS PROUT disbelievers fire DE Hell wherein they abide forever It suffices them. DEUS condemned them; they incurred everlasting retribution
